changelog.label: Initial Release
features: Feature - Chat bot functionality with AI-powered responses
Feature - Recent Searches functionality showing five most recent search prompts
Feature - Send Feedback functionality to contact AI development team
Feature - Reference Guide web page with bot usage details
Feature - Download chat history as Word document with citation links
Feature - Role-based permissions system (User, Admin, Super Admin)
Feature - User role with chat-only permissions
Feature - Admin role with upload/view/delete files and statistics access
Feature - Super Admin role with FAQ configuration, logo, and user/bot icon management

bugfixes: Bugfix - Performance issues resolved with app service plan upscaling configuration and application performance fixes

features: Feature - Performance improvements supporting 50 concurrent users with improved response times

bugfixes: Bugfix - Performance improvements to address timeout issues, including PDF call caching optimizations

features: Improvement - Reducing rerun to avoid refreshing some parts of the page
